title: vue-here-map
content:
**vue-here-map** is an advanced vue component to render detailed map in your Vue component. vue-here-map uses [here.com](https://github.com/swina/vue-here-map/blob/master/here.com) map service and in order to work you need an APIKEY that you can get with a [FREEMIUM account](https://developer.here.com/sign-up?create=Freemium-Basic&keepState=true&step=account). ## [](https://github.com/swina/vue-here-map#features)Features * uses \[here.com] map service (free up to 250K calls monthly) * address auto-complete (you don't need to give exact latitude and longitude data) * routing calculation and display (from address to destination ) * traffic indication (with incidents and viability) * markers custom colors * 4 positions info box with your content ## [](https://github.com/swina/vue-here-map#usage)Usage 1. Install thru **npm** ``` npm install @bit/swina.vue-components.global.vue-here-map ``` 2. Load scripts in your main.js ``` import LoadMapScript from '@bit/swina.vue-components.global.vue-here-map/here.maps.js' Vue.use ( LoadMapScript ) ``` 3. Include in your component ``` ``` 4. Create a .env to set the APIKEY In order to use the component you need a valid APIKEY from here.com. Create an .env file in the root of your project and add the following line. ***I suggest to create a domain whitelist from your account settings in order to use your APIKEY only from those domains*** ``` VUE_APP_HERE_APIKEY=your_here_api_key ``` ## [](https://github.com/swina/vue-here-map#attributes)Attributes ### [](https://github.com/swina/vue-here-map#coords-mode)Coords mode **origin** *(string lat,lng values separated by comma)* Set origin coords to display on the map. ``` ``` **endpoint** *(string lat,lng values separated by comma)* Set endpoint coords to display on the map (auto routing mode) ``` ``` ### [](https://github.com/swina/vue-here-map#autocomplete-mode)Autocomplete mode **address** *(string)* Autocomplete mode origin address to display on the map as the origin point (Start address in routing mode) ``` ``` **destination** *(string)* Autocomplete mode destination address. Using the destination address **vue-here-map** automatically calculate and visualize the routing ``` ``` ### [](https://github.com/swina/vue-here-map#options)Options **ui** *(true,**false**)* Enable map default UI (zoom,extra options) `` *Omit if you want to display the default UI.* **traffic** *(true,**false**)* Display traffic information. You can omit this attribute since the map has is own UI from where you can enable traffic information (incidents included) ``` ``` **infoBox** *(true,**false**)* Enable a box with your content. If enabled add your content using the slot `infoBox` ```

This is a demo of vue-here-map

 ``` **box** *(string)* Set the infoBox position. Available options : *top left* , *top right* , *bottom left* , *bottom right*. Default is *bottom left*. ```

This is a demo of vue-here-map

 ``` **color** *(string)* Set the color of the marker(s). When using with destination assign 2 colors separated by comma. Default is *green,red* ``` ``` **interactive** *(true,**false**)* When enabled clicking on city names display the population (if available) ``` ``` ## [](https://github.com/swina/vue-here-map#examples)Examples *Autocomplete indicates that vue-here-map will calculate geocoords of an address.* ### [](https://github.com/swina/vue-here-map#simple-map-no-autocomplete)Simple map, no autocomplete ``` ``` ### [](https://github.com/swina/vue-here-map#routing-map-no-autocomplete)Routing map, no autocomplete ``` ``` ### [](https://github.com/swina/vue-here-map#routing-map-with-autocomplete)Routing map with Autocomplete ``` ```
